channel.title: All my problems/ Router+Portforwarding
channel.description:
Ok, so I have so many problems and I think I know why..
The Netgear Router (good router) is plugged into a "Ubee router" (SHIT)
If I keep the netgear, and then get a regular Arris modem and plug the netgear into that modem, do you think my problems would go away?
The ubee router is killing my netgear with slowness and problems..
